header.gameNote: HALL OF FAME TIP-OFF TOURNAMENT AT SPRINGFIELD MA

article.description: Bryce Jones scored a game-high 21 points and Nikola Vucevicadded 19 to help Southern Cal defeat New Mexico State 80-61 on Sunday.
article.headline: Bryce Jones leads hot-shooting USC past New Mexico
article.linkText: Jones leads hot-shooting USC past New Mexico
article.story: SPRINGFIELD, Mass. -- Bryce Jones scored a game-high 21 points and Nikola Vucevic added 19 to help Southern Cal defeat New Mexico State 80-61 on Sunday in the Hall of Fame Tip-Off Classic. The Trojans (3-2) led 40-28 at halftime, thanks to 14-of-28 shooting (50 percent) and a 13-0 run. The spurt gave them a 17-5 lead with 13:47 left in the first. USC also went on a 9-2 run spanning the final 2:11 of the opening half. USC stayed hot in the second half, shooting 15 for 30 (50 percent) from the field. The Aggies (2-3) struggled from the floor, shooting 20 of 56 (35.7 percent) and trailed by 23, 75-52, with 3:24 remaining. Christian Kabongo led New Mexico State with 14 points and seven rebounds. Tshilidzi Nephawe and Gordo Castillo both came off the bench to score 13 apiece for the Aggies in the loss. Vucevic averaged 16.7 points and 9.7 rebounds during the three-game tournament.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
